1.title: Love, Romance & Heartbreak

episode of.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: A Single mother triumphs over racism, and sexism to fulfill her purpose as a famous national news anchor; but she later discovers that at the top, there's an entire set of addictions, loneliness, and heartbreaks that she must triumph over next.

2.title: Support is a Two-Way Street

episode of.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: A 3rd Culture child raised in Saudi Arabia, comes to America to experience a culture teeming with rampant violence, and discrimination. Finding her calling as a Social Activist, and a Media Personality in Hiphop Culture; her rise to stardom comes to an abrupt halt when she's faced with the decision to sacrifice it all for the love of her family.

3.title: Tears of the Life of the Party

episode of.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: A young man from Anguilla by way of Boston indirectly finds himself the Life of the Party in Caribbean culture due to his fun on stage with beautiful women of all body types. However, joy and pain show their true connection when the party life becomes a mask for a deeper dark weight of the mind called Depression.

4.title: Nightmare in the Garden

episode of.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: A young woman from Kingston, Jamaica, reveals her triumphs over life's horrific experiences while on her way to becoming a flourishing actress and journalist in the Entertainment Industry.

5.title: It's a ThinBlue Line

episode of.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: A young man from Florida desiring to be in the music industry finds himself employed as a Police officer when life makes an abrupt change. From police brutality to the conflict of policing urban neighborhoods, a now 5-year officer reconciles his views on Law Enforcement, and their impact on modern society.

6.title: Pain Was the Calling

episode of.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: She grew up in a sheltered home, desiring to be a helping hand to those who were suffering. Little did she know that the way she would be of help was to heal others by experiencing the very suffering she sought to eliminate.

imdb.plot outline: Actress and Media personality Cherrie Garden takes the viewer into the incredible lives of everyday people who have endured traumatic situations and have discovered how to turn their pain into power. Now armed with this power they are using it to change the lives of the World.
imdb.title: Go the Distance with Cherrie Garden
